creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
A listener to use during stress-testing runs that only records all the data from
error responses.  using the current view results tree during a big, long run
would run you out of memory quick, but users still need to see the details of
failed results.  A listener that logs the information to file would be ideal.

I'd particularly like to see the (html) output that generated a failed assert.
Right now I'm kinda blind in that all I can see is that the assert failed.
creator: tom@nooper.com

text:
Enabled the View Results Tree visualizer to record only error samples. 
Additionally, any visualizer can easily add this option.
